system.description: The true glory seekers, Knights are chivalrous to a point but have none of the @L[Class:Duelist]{Duelist's} respect for battles. Knights are the weapon masters, well-armored but relying on their swift, powerful attacks and powerful strength to destroy their enemy before they can counter attack. Knights are the real behemoths of the battlefield, leading troops into the fray and slaughtering all they can. If you are a Knight be looking for glory, looking for the next powerful weapon.

overview.base: You gain @L[Ability:Improved Strength]{Improved Strength} and @L[Ability:Melee Damage Boost]{Melee Damage Boost}. In addition, you are no longer suffer the consequences of @L[Property:Cumbersome]{cumbersome} items.

You may spend a @L[Core:Short Rest]{short rest} developing a battle plan against another area. You and your allies that are attacking this area when @L[Core:Combat]{combat} begins may each spend 1 @L[Core:MP]{MP} to gain @L[Ability:Triumphant Awaken]{Triumphant Awaken}. In addition, the first @L[Category:Attack abilities]{attack} you and each of your allies makes in this combat is @L[Keyword:Boosted]{boosted}.

system.requirements: You remain in the targeted area.

overview.base: You gain @L[Ability:Beastly Strength]{Beastly Strength} and @L[Ability:Improved Armor Piercing]{Improved Armor Piercing}.

Can wield @L[Property:Two-Handed]{two-handed} weapons in one hand.
Note: @L[Property:AP]{AP} weapons must still be wielded in two hands to be @L[Property:AV0]{AV0}.
Melee weapons you use are @L[Property:Armor Piercing]{armor piercing}.
You may spend an unused @L[Core:Active Maneuvers]{action} to @L[Keyword:Boosted]{boost} the triggering @L[Core:Damage]{damage}.
overview.proficient: You may spend an additional unused @L[Core:Active Maneuvers]{action} to @L[Keyword:Boosted]{boost} the triggering @L[Core:Damage]{damage} again.

system.trigger: You have hit a creature with a @L[Category:Damaging effects]{damaging} melee @L[Category:Weapon delivery abilities]{weapon} @L[Category:Attack abilities]{attack}.
